bibl.title: Letter from H. C. Corbin to the Chairman of the Committee on Pensions, January 22, 1903

div1.p: Corbin sends a statement of military service of Reed to the Committee on Pensions regarding Senate Bill #6702. [Courtesy of the National Archives and Records Administration]

div1.head: Letter from H. C. Corbin to the Chairman of the Committee on Pensions, January 22, 1903
div1.opener:
468586/A.
WAR DEPARTMENT,
ADJUTANT GENERALS OFFICE.
WASHINGTON.
January 22, 1903.
The
Chairman, Committee on Pensions,
United States Senate.
Sir:
div1.p:
In response to the request of your committee, dated January 16, 1903, for
use in connection with Senate Bill 6702, I have the honor to enclose herewith a state-
ment of the military service of the late Walter Reed, Major and Surgeon, U. S. Army.
div1.closer:
Very respectfully, H. C. Corbin Adjutant General,
Major General, U. S. Army.
1 enclosure.
MAILED JAN 23 1903
